anya-e0809n4:4_0: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
anya-e0809n4:9_0: Sobhanaṁ ruciraṁ sādhu, manuññaṁ cāru sundaraṁ;
anya-e0809n4:10_0: Vaggu manoramaṁ kantaṁ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:12_0: Bhaddaṁ vāmañca kalyāṇaṁ, manāpaṁ laddhakaṁ subhaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:15_0: Mukhyo padhānaṁ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṁ;
anya-e0809n4:16_0: Paṇītaṁ paramaṁ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
anya-e0809n4:19_0: Sīha kuñjara saddūlā, dī tu samāsagā pume.
anya-e0809n4:22_0: Iṭṭhaṁ tu subhagaṁ hajjaṁ, dayitaṁ vallabhaṁ piyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:24_0: Tucchañca rittakaṁ suññaṁ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
anya-e0809n4:25_0: Mejjhaṁ pūtaṁ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
anya-e0809n4:27_0: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
anya-e0809n4:32_0: Brahā mahantaṁ vipulaṁ, visālaṁ puthulaṁ puthu.
anya-e0809n4:34_0: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṁ thūlañca pīvaraṁ;
anya-e0809n4:35_0: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṁ nicitaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:37_0: Sabbaṁ samatta makhilaṁ, nikhilaṁ sakalaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n4:40_0: Bhūri pahutaṁ pacuraṁ, bhiyyo sambahulaṁ bahu;
anya-e0809n4:43_0: Parosatādī te, yesaṁ, paraṁ mattaṁ satādito;
anya-e0809n4:44_0: Parittaṁ sukhumaṁ khuddaṁ, thoka mappaṁ kisaṁ tanu.
anya-e0809n4:51_0: Sakāsaṁ antikaṁ ñattaṁ, dūraṁ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:53_0: Nirantaraṁ ghanaṁ sandaṁ, viraḷaṁ pelavaṁ tanu;
anya-e0809n4:54_0: Athā yataṁ dīgha matho, nittalaṁ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:56_0: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
anya-e0809n4:57_0: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
anya-e0809n4:59_0: Aḷāraṁ vellitaṁ vaṅkaṁ, kuṭilaṁ jimha kuñcitaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:60_0: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
anya-e0809n4:63_0: Lahu sallahukaṁ cātha, saṅkhyātaṁ gaṇitaṁ mitaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:65_0: Tiṇhaṁ tu tikhiṇaṁ tibbaṁ, caṇḍaṁ uggaṁ kharaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:69_0: Thāvaro jaṅgamā añño, lolaṁ tu cañcalaṁ calaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:74_0: Kurūraṁ kaṭhinaṁ daḷhaṁ, niṭṭhuraṁ kakkhaḷaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:77_0: Jighaññaṁ carimaṁ pubbaṁ, tva’ggaṁ paṭhama mādi so;
anya-e0809n4:80_0: Byattaṁ puṭa phuṭaṁ (sī.) ñca mudu tu, sukumārañca komalaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:83_0: Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
anya-e0809n4:84_0: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṁ tu niraggalaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:86_0: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
anya-e0809n4:87_0: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṁ, sambādho tu ca saṁkaṭaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:89_0: Vāmaṁ kaḷevaraṁ sabyaṁ; Apasabyaṁ tu dakkhiṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:95_0: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
anya-e0809n4:96_0: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
anya-e0809n4:99_0: Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
anya-e0809n4:101_0: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:106_0: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:112_0: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
anya-e0809n4:116_0: Kāruṇiko dayālupi, sūrato ussuko tu ca;
anya-e0809n4:119_0: Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
anya-e0809n4:120_0: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
anya-e0809n4:126_0: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
anya-e0809n4:136_0: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
anya-e0809n4:138_0: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu ca lajjālutu ca lajjavā (ka.);
anya-e0809n4:139_0: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
anya-e0809n4:141_0: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
anya-e0809n4:142_0: Eḷamūgo tu vattuñca, sotuṁ cā’kusalo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:145_0: Vācālo bahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
anya-e0809n4:152_0: Sīsacchejjamhi vajjho tha, nikato ca saṭho’nuju;
anya-e0809n4:156_0: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṁ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
anya-e0809n4:159_0: Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:160_0: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
anya-e0809n4:163_0: Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
anya-e0809n4:171_0: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṁ kuthitaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:174_0: Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
anya-e0809n4:175_0: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṁ tu ca tejitaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:177_0: Pattabbaṁ gamma māpajjaṁ āsajjaṁ (ka.), pakkaṁ pariṇataṁ samā;
anya-e0809n4:178_0: Veṭhitaṁ tu valayitaṁ, ruddhaṁ saṁvuta māvutaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:184_0: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṁ dhanitaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:188_0: Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
anya-e0809n4:189_0: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
anya-e0809n4:201_0: Bhaṭṭhaṁ tu galitaṁ pannaṁ, cutañca dhaṁsitaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:209_0: Anvesitaṁ gavesitaṁ, laddhaṁ tu patta muccate.
anya-e0809n4:212_0: Pālitaṁ atha ossaṭṭhaṁ, cattaṁ hīnaṁ samujjhitaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:227_0: Ñeyyaṁ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
anya-e0809n4:230_0: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṁ tu suddhakammani;
anya-e0809n4:233_0: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṁ, tappanaṁ tu ca pīṇanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:237_0: Ninnimittaṁ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
anya-e0809n4:247_0: Pacā pāko havo huti hūbhi (sī. amarakosa),
anya-e0809n4:250_0: Jīraṇaṁ jāni tāṇaṁ tu, rakkhaṇaṁ pamitippamā;
anya-e0809n4:254_0: Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:268_1: pī.) tu majjhanho, vemattaṁ tu ca nānatā.
anya-e0809n4:270_0: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṁ jāgariyo (ṭī.), pavāho tu pavatti ca;
anya-e0809n4:282_0: Osānaṁ pariyosānaṁ, ukkaṁso’tisayo bhave avasānaṁ samāpanaṁ (?);
anya-e0809n4:286_0: Kiccaṁ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
anya-e0809n4:291_0: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
anya-e0809n4:305_0: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0809n4:306_0: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n4:309_0: Pamāṇe ca pasaṁsāyaṁ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
anya-e0809n4:315_0: Cakkaṁ sampattiyaṁ cakka, ratane maṇḍale bale.
anya-e0809n4:328_0: Attho payojane saddā, bhidheyye vuddhiyaṁ dhane;
anya-e0809n4:334_0: Guṇo paṭala rāsīsu, ānisaṁse ca bandhane;
anya-e0809n4:335_0: Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:338_0: Bhūto satta mahābhūtā, manussesu na nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:340_0: Vāccaliṅgo atītasmiṁ, jāte patte same mato;
anya-e0809n4:345_0: Anto nitthī samīpe cā, vasāne padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:348_0: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
anya-e0809n4:352_0: Vāsaṭṭhāne ca gamane, visaṭatte visaratta visadattegatīritā.
anya-e0809n4:354_0: Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:360_0: Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:361_0: Kathane pamuttabhāva, jjhenādo jjhesanādo (sī.)vutta mapi tīsu.
anya-e0809n4:366_0: Sotaviññeyya satthesu, sutaṁ putte suto siyā;
anya-e0809n4:368_0: Kappo kāle yuge lese, paññatti paramāyusu;
anya-e0809n4:379_0: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
anya-e0809n4:381_0: Ārogye kusalaṁ iṭṭha, vipāke kusalo tathā;
anya-e0809n4:390_0: Sevito yena yo niccaṁ, tatthāpi visayo siyā;
anya-e0809n4:391_0: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
anya-e0809n4:393_0: Bhāvo padatthe sattāya, madhippāya kriyāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:396_0: So bandhave’ttani ca saṁ, so dhanasmi manitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:397_0: Sā pume sunakhe vutto, ttaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:399_0: Suvaṇṇaṁ kanake vuttaṁ, suvaṇṇo garuḷe tathā;
anya-e0809n4:402_0: Varo devādikā devādito (sī.) iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
anya-e0809n4:403_0: Uttame vāccaliṅgo so, varaṁ mandappiye byayaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:408_0: Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n4:409_0: Brahmā vutto tathā brahmaṁ, vede tapasi vuccate.
anya-e0809n4:412_0: Mekhalāyaṁ matā kacchā, kaccho vutto latāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:416_0: Pamāṇaṁ hetu satthesu, māne ca saccavādini;
anya-e0809n4:419_0: Sattaṁ dabba’ttabhāvesu, pāṇesu ca bale, siyā bale sakkā (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:428_0: Padaṁ ṭhāne parittāṇe, nibbānamhi ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:429_0: Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṁ.
anya-e0809n4:434_0: Khuddā ca makkhikābhede, madhumhi khudda, mappake;
anya-e0809n4:435_0: Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
anya-e0809n4:437_0: Takke maraṇaliṅge ca, ariṭṭhaṁ asubhe subhe,;
anya-e0809n4:438_0: Ariṭṭho āsave kāke, nimbe ca pheniladdume.
anya-e0809n4:443_0: Mittakāre lañjadāne, bale rāsi vipattisu balarāsi vipattisu (ka.);
anya-e0809n4:446_0: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṁ vaṇṇe ca paccaye;
anya-e0809n4:447_0: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:449_0: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṁ madane rate;
anya-e0809n4:450_0: Kāmo, kāmaṁ nikāme, cā, nuññāyaṁ kāma mabyayaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:458_0: Vuddhiyaṁ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:470_0: Ārammaṇe ca saṁsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
anya-e0809n4:473_0: Tīsu channaṁ patirūpe, chādite ca nigūhite;
anya-e0809n4:485_0: Viññāṇe cittakamme ca, vicitte citta muccate;
anya-e0809n4:488_0: Sāmaṁ vedantare sāntve, taṁ pīte sāmale tisu;
anya-e0809n4:489_0: Sayamatthe byayaṁ sāmaṁ, sāmā ca sārivāyapi.
anya-e0809n4:492_0: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarā’lahukesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:494_0: Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
anya-e0809n4:498_0: Devo visuddhidevā’do, megha maccu nabhesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:499_0: Athopi taruṇe satte, corepi māṇavo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:504_0: Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:505_0: Uḷāro tīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
anya-e0809n4:507_0: Sampanno tīsu sampuṇṇe, madhure ca samaṅgini;
anya-e0809n4:508_0: Saṅkhā tu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:511_0: Atho māne pakāreca, koṭṭhāseca vidho dvisu.
anya-e0809n4:514_0: Ñāṇe ca somanasseca, vedo chandasi co’ccate.
anya-e0809n4:516_0: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sā yoni so (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:517_0: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṁ, velā rāsimhi bhāsitā.
anya-e0809n4:519_0: Vohāro sadda paṇṇatti, vaṇijjā cetanāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:524_0: Rāge tu mānaso cittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:526_0: Mūlaṁ bhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
anya-e0809n4:527_0: Rūpādyaṁ’sa pakaṇḍesu, khandho rāsi guṇesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:530_0: Atho hadayavatthumhi, citte ca hadayaṁ ure.
anya-e0809n4:536_0: Ālambaro tu sārambhe, bheribhede ca dissati.
anya-e0809n4:542_0: Vissāse yācanāyañca, peme ca paṇayo mato.
anya-e0809n4:547_0: Samatthane mato citte, kaggatāyaṁ samādhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:552_0: Bhūmibhāge kilese ca, male cā’ṅgaṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n4:554_0: Dhanādidappe paññāya, abhimāno mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:555_0: Apadeso nimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
anya-e0809n4:557_0: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attā parama’ttani;
anya-e0809n4:558_0: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṁ thambhasmiṁ (ṭī.), samūhe balasajjane.
anya-e0809n4:560_0: Antoghare kusūle ca, koṭṭho ntokucchiyaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:564_0: Atho sikhaṇḍe tūṇīre, kalāpo nikare mato.
anya-e0809n4:566_0: Cūḷā saṁyatakesesu, makuṭe moḷi ca dvisu;
anya-e0809n4:567_0: Saṅkho tva’nitthiyaṁ kambu, nalāṭa’ṭṭhīsu lalāṭaṭṭhīsu (sī.) gopphake.
anya-e0809n4:569_0: Pakkho kāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
anya-e0809n4:570_0: Dese’ṇṇave pume sindhu, saritāyaṁ sa nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:572_0: Gaje kareṇu purise, so hatthiniya mitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:575_0: Visāṇaṁ tīsu mātaṅga, dante ca pasusiṅgake;
anya-e0809n4:576_0: Koṭiyaṁ tu mato koṇo, tathā vādittavādane.
anya-e0809n4:578_0: Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamo tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:582_0: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
anya-e0809n4:585_0: Uttaṁso tva’ vataṁso ca, kaṇṇapūre ca sekhare.
anya-e0809n4:590_0: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
anya-e0809n4:597_0: Aṁse sippe kalā kāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
anya-e0809n4:605_0: Kriyacitte ca karaṇe, kiriyaṁ kammani kriyā;
anya-e0809n4:606_0: Sunisāyaṁ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhū matā.
anya-e0809n4:609_0: Suttaṁ pāvacane riṭṭhe siddhe (ṭī.), tante taṁ supite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:611_0: Rājaliṅgo’sabhaṅgesu, rukkhe ca kakudokakudho (ṭī. sī.) pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:614_0: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṁ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:615_0: Bhariyāyaṁ tu kedāre, sarīre khetta mīritaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:618_0: Sūlaṁ tu nitthiyaṁ heti, bhede saṁku rujāsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:621_0: Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo, kappamhi yugale yugaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:623_0: Itthipupphe ca reṇumhi, rajo pakatije guṇe;
anya-e0809n4:627_0: Paṇḍake joti nakkhatta, raṁsīsva’ggimhi joti so.
anya-e0809n4:629_0: Kaṇḍo nitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:630_0: Uddhaṁbāhudvayamāne bāhudvayummāne (sī. ka.), sūrattepi ca porisaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:636_0: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅga muccate.
anya-e0809n4:639_0: Heme pañcasuvaṇṇe ca, nikkho nitthī pasādhane.
anya-e0809n4:641_0: Tithibhede ca sākhādi, phaḷumhi pabba muccate;
anya-e0809n4:654_0: Sassate ca dhuvo tīsu, dhuvaṁ takke ca nicchite.
anya-e0809n4:656_0: Hare sivo, sivaṁ bhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
anya-e0809n4:657_0: Senāyaṁ sattiyañceva, thūlatte ca balaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:660_0: Devabhede vasu pume, paṇḍakaṁ ratane dhane.
anya-e0809n4:662_0: Nibbānaṁ atthagamane, apavagge siyā tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:666_0: Sukkaṁ tu sambhave, sukko, dhavale, kusale tisu.
anya-e0809n4:668_0: Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṁ vane dhane (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:671_0: Paribhāsana makkose, niyame bhāsane tha ca,
anya-e0809n4:680_0: Pupphe phale ca pasavo, uppāde gabbhamocane;
anya-e0809n4:690_0: Majjhimo dehamajjhasmiṁ, majjhabhave ca so tisu.
anya-e0809n4:693_0: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:695_0: Kumāro yuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:698_0: Paṇo vetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
anya-e0809n4:701_0: Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṁ vuttaṁ dvaye pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:707_0: Cāge sabhāve nimmāne, saggo jjhāye divepyatha;
anya-e0809n4:708_0: Rohito lohite maccha, bhede ceva migantare.
anya-e0809n4:714_0: Dabbaṁ bhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
anya-e0809n4:716_0: Mānaṁ pamāṇe patthādo, māno vutto vidhāya ca;
anya-e0809n4:717_0: Atho parissame vutto, vāyāmo vīriyepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:720_0: Chidde tu chiddavante ca, susiraṁ tūriyantare.
anya-e0809n4:723_0: Atho gārava bhītīsu, saṁvege sambhamo mato.
anya-e0809n4:728_0: Māse jeṭṭho, tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
anya-e0809n4:729_0: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo, so pasatthatare tisu.
anya-e0809n4:731_0: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
anya-e0809n4:735_0: Bimbaṁ tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale.
anya-e0809n4:740_0: Samā vasse, samo kheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
anya-e0809n4:744_0: Rattaṁ tu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:746_0: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
anya-e0809n4:747_0: Utubhede tu sisiro, hime so sītale tisu.
anya-e0809n4:749_0: Sakkharā guḷabhede ca, kathalepi ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:750_0: Anuggahe tu saṅkhepe, gahaṇe saṅgaho mato.
anya-e0809n4:752_0: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
anya-e0809n4:753_0: Rājā tu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:755_0: Khalañca dhaññakaraṇe, kakke nīce khalo bhave;
anya-e0809n4:759_0: Bhayaṅkare tu kaṭhine, kurūro tīsu niddaye.
anya-e0809n4:764_0: Adharo tīsvadho hīne, pume dantacchade pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:765_0: Sussusā sotu micchāya, sā pāricariyāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:767_0: Hattho pāṇimhi ratane, gaṇe soṇḍāya bhantare;
anya-e0809n4:768_0: Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpo kumbhe ca dissati.
anya-e0809n4:771_0: Vajjabhede ca vita taṁ, taṁ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:773_0: Sāro bale thiraṁse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:776_0: Mandire rogabhede ca, khayo apacayamhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:777_0: Vāḷo tu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:779_0: Sālo sajjaddume rukkhe, sālāgehe ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:780_0: Sote tu savanaṁ vuttaṁ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
anya-e0809n4:782_0: Tīsu pato pareto ca, mate ca petayonije;
anya-e0809n4:783_0: Khyāte tu haṭṭhe viññāte, patītaṁ vāccaliṅgikaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:785_0: Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayo kathito tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:786_0: Pattaṁ pakkhe dale, patto, bhājane so gate tisu.
anya-e0809n4:788_0: Kusale sukataṁ, suṭṭhu, kate ca sukato tisu;
anya-e0809n4:792_0: Assādane tu rasanaṁ, jivhāyañca dhanimhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:794_0: Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihite pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:797_0: Pāpasmiṁ gagane dukkhe, byasane cā’gha muccate;
anya-e0809n4:798_0: Samūhe paṭalaṁ netta, roge vuttaṁ chadimhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:801_0: Sattannaṁ pūraṇe seṭṭhe, tisante sattamo tisu.
anya-e0809n4:803_0: Ojā tu yāpanāyañca, ojo ditti balesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:804_0: Atho nisāmanaṁ vuttaṁ, dassane savanepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:806_0: Gabbho kucchiṭṭhasatte ca, kucchi ovarakesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:812_0: Asumhi āyumhi (ṭī.), 407-gāthā passitabbā ca bale pāṇo, satte hadayagā’nile;
anya-e0809n4:819_0: Saraṇaṁ tu vadhe gehe, rakkhitasmiñca rakkhaṇe.
anya-e0809n4:821_0: Thiyaṁ kantā piye, kanto, manuññe, so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:822_0: Gavakkhe tu samūhe ca, jālaṁ macchādibandhane.
anya-e0809n4:825_0: Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṁ, saddhā ca paccaye.
anya-e0809n4:827_0: Bījaṁ hetumhi aṭṭhismiṁ, aṅgajāte ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:832_0: Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
anya-e0809n4:834_0: Santāno devarukkhe ca, vutto santatiyaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:838_0: Chāyā tu ātapābhāve, paṭibimbe pabhāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:840_0: Gimhe ghammo nidāgho ca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:843_0: Aṅgā dese bahumha’ṅgaṁ, aṅgo dese vapumha’ṅga (ṭī.) tathā’vayavahetusu;
anya-e0809n4:847_0: Supinaṁ supine sutta, viññāṇe ta manitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:855_0: Vutto visārado tīsu, suppagabbhe ca paṇḍite;
anya-e0809n4:858_0: Drave vaṇṇe rasabhede, kasāyo surabhimhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:865_0: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
anya-e0809n4:867_0: Lohabhede mataṁ tambaṁ, tambo ratte tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:870_0: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṁ paṭipādanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:873_0: Satthaṁ āyudha ganthesu, lohe, sattho ca sañcaye;
anya-e0809n4:877_0: Atha kambu mato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:880_0: Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
anya-e0809n4:892_0: Paṭibhānaṁ tu paññāyaṁ, upaṭṭhita girāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:895_0: Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṁ gahaṇī’tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:897_0: Piyo bhattari, jāyāyaṁ, piyā, iṭṭhe piyo tisu;
anya-e0809n4:898_0: Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṁyame ca yamo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:900_0: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:901_0: Ulloce tu ca vitthāre, vitānaṁ punnapuṁsake.
anya-e0809n4:903_0: Apavagge ca salile, sudhāyaṁ amataṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0809n4:904_0: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tama manitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:906_0: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
anya-e0809n4:907_0: Paṇḍake sukate, puññaṁ, manuññe pavane tisu.
anya-e0809n4:909_0: Rukkho dumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
anya-e0809n4:910_0: Uppattiyaṁ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
anya-e0809n4:912_0: Nimittaṁ kāraṇe vuttaṁ, aṅgajāte ca lañchane;
anya-e0809n4:915_0: Vede ca mantane manto, mantā paññāya muccate;
anya-e0809n4:918_0: Aruṇo raṁsibhede cā, byattarāge ca lohite;
anya-e0809n4:922_0: Ākāro kāraṇe vutto, saṇṭhāne iṅgitepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:924_0: Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo, tibbamhi so tisu;
anya-e0809n4:927_0: Kallaṁ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesu yuttadakkhesu (ka.) tīsu taṁ;
anya-e0809n4:930_0: Kapoto pakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:933_0: Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiye sāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:934_0: Akāriye tu guyhaṅge, cīre kopīna muccate.
anya-e0809n4:940_0: Athuppāde siyā dhūma, ketu vessānarepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:945_0: Apavagge vināse ca, nirodho rodhane pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:946_0: Bhaye paṭibhayaṁ vuttaṁ, tiliṅgaṁ taṁ bhayaṁkare.
anya-e0809n4:952_0: Upajāpe mato bhedo, visese ca vidāraṇe.
anya-e0809n4:958_0: Guṇukkaṁse ca vibhave, sampatti ceva sampadā.
anya-e0809n4:960_0: Bhūkhantīsu khamā, yogye, hite sakke yutte (ṭī.) 1001-gāthā passitabbākhamo tisu;
anya-e0809n4:961_0: Addho bhāge pathe kāle, ekaṁse’ddho’byayaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:964_0: Usabho’sadha go usabho usabhe (ṭī.) seṭṭhe, sū’sabhaṁ vīsayaṭṭhiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:965_0: Setusmiṁ tanti pantīsu, nāriyaṁ pāḷi kathyate.
anya-e0809n4:967_0: Kaṭo jaye’tthinimitte, kilañje so kate tisu;
anya-e0809n4:970_0: Vitakke mathite takko, tathā sūciphale mato;
anya-e0809n4:974_0: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṁ mihite sitaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:976_0: Thiyaṁ pajāpati dāre, brahme māre sure pume;
anya-e0809n4:977_0: Vāsudeve’ntake kaṇho, so pāpe asite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:980_0: Sakko inde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
anya-e0809n4:982_0: Vajjane parihāro ca, sakkāre ceva rakkhaṇe;
anya-e0809n4:983_0: Sotāpannādike agge, ariyo tīsu, dvije pume.
anya-e0809n4:985_0: Susuko susumāre ca, bālake ca ulūpini;
anya-e0809n4:988_0: Asano piyake kaṇḍe, bhakkhaṇe khipane’ sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:989_0: Yuge’dhikāre vikāre (ṭī.) vīriye, padhāne cā’ntike dhuro.
anya-e0809n4:991_0: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asito pume;
anya-e0809n4:994_0: Ummāre esikatthambhe, indakhīlo mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:997_0: Dhaññaṁ sālyādike vuttaṁ, dhañño puññavati ttisu;
anya-e0809n4:998_0: Pāṇi hatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṁ mato.
anya-e0809n4:1000_0: Tīsu pītaṁ halidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
anya-e0809n4:1003_0: Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgo ca rañjane mato;
anya-e0809n4:1004_0: Padaro phalake bhaṅge, pavuddha dariyaṁ pica.
anya-e0809n4:1010_0: Kāro’ gabhede sakkāre, kārā tu bandhanālaye.
anya-e0809n4:1013_0: Pāpane ca padātismiṁ, gamane patti nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1015_0: Chiddaṁ randhañca vivaraṁ, susire dūsanepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1016_0: Muttā tu muttike, muttaṁ, passāve, muccite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1018_0: Nisedhe vāraṇaṁ, hatthi, liṅga hatthīsu vāraṇo;
anya-e0809n4:1019_0: Dānaṁ cāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
anya-e0809n4:1024_0: Haritasmiñca paṇṇe ca, palāso kiṁ sukaddume;
anya-e0809n4:1027_0: Pakkaṁ phalamhi, taṁ nāsu, mmukhe nāsamukhe (ka.) pariṇate tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1028_0: Piṇḍo ājīvane dehe, piṇḍane goḷake mato.
anya-e0809n4:1030_0: Vaṭṭo paribbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1033_0: Nāriyaṁ bhīru kathitā, bhīruke so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:1036_0: Vāmaṁ sabyamhi, taṁ cāru, viparītesu tīsva’tha;
anya-e0809n4:1037_0: Saṅkhyābhede sarabye ca, cihaṇe lakkha muccate.
anya-e0809n4:1050_0: Sambhave cā’suci pume, amejjhe tīsu dissati.
anya-e0809n4:1052_0: Accho ikke pume vutto, pasannamhi tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:1053_0: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko, so kuṭile tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1057_0: Sabbasmiṁ sakalo tīsu, addhamhi purise siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1062_0: Rudhire lohitaṁ vuttaṁ, rattamhi lohito tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1063_0: Uttamaṅge pume muddhā, muddho mūḷhe tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:1065_0: Raṭṭhamhi vijitaṁ vuttaṁ, jite ca vijito tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1066_0: Parittaṁ tu parittāṇe, paritto tīsu appake.
anya-e0809n4:1071_0: Vaṅgo lohantare vaṅgā, dese pume bahumhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1072_0: Kammārabhaṇḍabhede ca, khaṭake muṭṭhi ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n4:1077_0: Pume mahesī sugate, deviyaṁ nāriyaṁ matā;
anya-e0809n4:1081_0: Vijjā vede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1084_0: Pajjaṁ siloke, pajjo’ddhe, pajjo pādahite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1087_0: Vidheyye assavo tīsu, pubbamhī purise siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1092_0: Assattho tīsu assāsa, ppatte, bodhiddume pume;
anya-e0809n4:1093_0: Tīsu luddo kurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1095_0: Vilaggo tīsu laggasmiṁ, pume majjhamhi dissati;
anya-e0809n4:1098_0: Kaṭṭhaṁ dārumhi, taṁ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1099_0: Sasantāne ca visaye, gocare’ jjhatta muccateti.
anya-e0809n4:1102_0: Bhuvane ca jane loko, moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
anya-e0809n4:1106_0: Vaṭabyāmesu nigrodho, dhaṅko tu vāyase bake;
anya-e0809n4:1109_0: Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
anya-e0809n4:1113_0: Sūraṁ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍo tu muggare dame;
anya-e0809n4:1121_0: Dāyādo bandhave putte, sire sīsaṁ tipumhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1126_0: Thambho thūṇa jaḷattesu, sūpo kummāsa byañjane;
anya-e0809n4:1127_0: Gaṇḍo phoṭe kapolamhi, aggho mūlye ca pūjane.
anya-e0809n4:1130_0: Bhāgye vidhi vidhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
anya-e0809n4:1132_0: Sāraṅgo cātake eṇe, pattī tu sarapakkhisu;
anya-e0809n4:1140_0: Amate tu sudhā lepe, abhikhyā nāma raṁsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1141_0: Satti sāmatthiye satthe, mahī najjantare bhuvi;
anya-e0809n4:1146_0: Pavatti vutti vattāsu, vetane bharaṇe bhati.
anya-e0809n4:1149_0: Soppe pamāde tandī ca, yātrā gamana vuttisu.
anya-e0809n4:1154_0: Icchāyaṁ jutiyaṁ kanti, rañjane sūrate rati;
anya-e0809n4:1155_0: Gehe vasati vāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
anya-e0809n4:1157_0: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samiti saṅgame;
anya-e0809n4:1158_0: Taṇhā lobhe pipāsāyaṁ, magga vuttīsu vattanī.
anya-e0809n4:1160_0: Pāṇyaṅge nābhi cakkante, yāce viññatti ñāpane;
anya-e0809n4:1161_0: Vitti tose vedanāyaṁ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
anya-e0809n4:1163_0: Taraṅge cā’ntare vīci, dhīratte dhāraṇe dhiti;
anya-e0809n4:1164_0: Bhū bhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
anya-e0809n4:1166_0: Gottaṁ nāme ca vaṁse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1167_0: Okaṁ tu nissaye gehe, kulaṁ tu gottarāsisu.
anya-e0809n4:1169_0: Heme vitte hiraññañca, paññāṇaṁ tva’ṅka vuddhisu;
anya-e0809n4:1170_0: Athā’mbarañca khe vatthe, guyhaṁ liṅge rahasya’pi.
anya-e0809n4:1172_0: Tapo dhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1173_0: Ratanaṁ maṇi seṭṭhesu, vassaṁ hāyana vuṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n4:1175_0: Vanaṁ arañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
anya-e0809n4:1176_0: Akkharaṁ lipi mokkhesu, methūnaṁ saṅgame rate.
anya-e0809n4:1178_0: Sotaṁ kaṇṇe payovege, riṭṭhaṁ pāpā’subhesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:1182_0: Vāccaliṅgā paramito, byatto tu paṇḍite phuṭe.
anya-e0809n4:1188_0: Bībhaccho vikate bhīme, komale tikhiṇe mudu;
anya-e0809n4:1189_0: Iṭṭhe ca madhure sādu, sādumhi madhuro piye.
anya-e0809n4:1191_0: Site tu suddhe odāto, dvijivho sūcakā’hisu;
anya-e0809n4:1197_0: Suci suddhe site pūte, pesalo dakkhacārusu;
anya-e0809n4:1198_0: Adhamo kucchite ūne, appiye pya’liko bhave.
anya-e0809n4:1200_0: Byāpe asuddhe saṁkiṇṇo, bhabbaṁ yogye ca bhāvini;
anya-e0809n4:1201_0: Sukhumo appakā’ṇūsu, vuddho there ca paṇḍite.
anya-e0809n4:1203_0: Subhe sādhumhi bhaddo tha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
anya-e0809n4:1204_0: Dhīro budhe dhitimante, vellitaṁ kuṭile dhute.
anya-e0809n4:1206_0: Visado byatta setesu, taruṇo tu yuve nave;
anya-e0809n4:1211_0: Kalyāṇaṁ sundare cāpi, himo tu sītalepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1213_0: Lole tu sīghe capalo, vutte udita muggate;
anya-e0809n4:1214_0: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṁ tu cuṇṇitepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1216_0: Vigate vāyite vāyane (ka.)vītaṁ, bhāvitaṁ vaḍḍhitepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1217_0: Bhajjite patite bhaṭṭho, puṭṭho pucchita posite.
anya-e0809n4:1221_0: Sūro vīre ravisūre, duṭṭho kuddhe ca dūsite.
anya-e0809n4:1225_0: Nindāyaṁ khepane khepo, niyamo nicchaye vate.
anya-e0809n4:1236_0: Mālyaṁ tu pupphe taddāme, vāho tu sakaṭe haye.
anya-e0809n4:1239_0: Bhe tārakā nettamajjhe, sīmā’ vadhi, ṭṭhitīsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:1243_0: Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latā sākhāya valliyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1247_0: Nīce puthujjano mūḷhe, bhattā sāmini dhārake.
anya-e0809n4:1249_0: Sikhā, piñchesu sikhaṇḍo, satte tva’ttani puggalo;
anya-e0809n4:1253_0: Vacco rūpe karīse tha, juti’tthī kantiraṁsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1255_0: Labbhaṁ yutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṁ mataṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1256_0: Sallaṁ kaṇḍe salākāyaṁ, sucitte dhāvanaṁ gate;
anya-e0809n4:1261_0: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhū niccappabhūsu so.
anya-e0809n4:1263_0: Khagge kurūre nettiṁso, parasmiṁ atra tīsva’mu;
anya-e0809n4:1268_0: Yānaṁ rathādo gamane, sarūpasmiṁ adho talaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1270_0: Majjho vilagge vemajjhe, pupphaṁ tu kusumo’tusu;
anya-e0809n4:1271_0: Sīlaṁ sabhāve subbate, puṅgavo usabhe vare.
anya-e0809n4:1274_0: Nettiṁse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambo tu dume caye.
anya-e0809n4:1277_0: Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṁ pāpe ca kaddame.
anya-e0809n4:1280_0: Bale pabhāve vīriyaṁ, tejo tesu ca dittiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1282_0: Dhārā santati khaggaṅge, vānaṁ taṇhāya sibbane;
anya-e0809n4:1283_0: Khattā sūte paṭihāre, vitti pīḷāsu vedanā.
anya-e0809n4:1285_0: Thiyaṁ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
anya-e0809n4:1286_0: Lavotu bindu’cchedesu, palāle’ palāse (ṭī.), palāpe-ṭī (453-1124) gāthā passitabbā tisaye bhusaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1288_0: Bādhā dukkhe nisedhe ca, mūlapadepi mātikā;
anya-e0809n4:1292_0: Ketusmiṁ ketanaṁ gehe, ṭhāne bhūmi’tthiyaṁ bhuvi;
anya-e0809n4:1293_0: Lekhye lekho rāji lekhā, pūjite bhagavā jine.
anya-e0809n4:1295_0: Gadā satthe gado roge, nisajjā pīṭhesvā’sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1299_0: Bilaṁ koṭṭhāsa chiddesu, vajjaṁ dose ca bheriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1304_0: Yūpo thambhe ca pāsāde, ayanaṁ gamane pathe.
anya-e0809n4:1317_0: Annādo āmisaṁ maṁse; Dikkhā tu yajane’ccane.
anya-e0809n4:1321_0: Kusumaṁ thīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
anya-e0809n4:1323_0: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddo tu luddakepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1324_0: Kalusaṁ tvā’vile pāpe, pāpe kali parājaye.
anya-e0809n4:1326_0: Kantāro vana, duggesu, caro cāramhi cañcale;
anya-e0809n4:1327_0: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṁ tu phalake tace.
anya-e0809n4:1331_0: Sattāyaṁ bhavanaṁ gehe, lese tu khalite chalaṁ.
anya-e0809n4:1333_0: Veraṁ pāpe ca paṭighe, taco cammani vakkale;
anya-e0809n4:1336_0: Paṭihāre mukhe dvāraṁ, pete ñāte mato tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1337_0: Māso paraṇṇa kālesu, naggo tva’celakepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1339_0: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho, migādo chagale pasu;
anya-e0809n4:1340_0: Arūpe cā’vhaye nāmaṁ, daro daratha bhītisu.
anya-e0809n4:1350_0: Havi sappimhi hotabbe, siro seṭṭhe ca muddhani;
anya-e0809n4:1351_0: Vicārepi viveko tha, sikharī pabbate dume.
anya-e0809n4:1353_0: Vego jave pavāhe ca, saṅku tu khilahetisu;
anya-e0809n4:1354_0: Niggahīte kaṇe bindu, varāho sūkare gaje.
anya-e0809n4:1371_0: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullo khudde ca uddhane.
anya-e0809n4:1381_0: Sākhāyaṁ viṭapo thambhe, sattu khajjantare dise;
anya-e0809n4:1384_0: Rāge raṅgo naccaṭṭhāne, pānaṁ peyye ca pītiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n4:1392_0: Matā’vāṭe caye kāsu, panisā kāraṇe raho;
anya-e0809n4:1400_0: Dasā’ vatthā paṭantesu, kāraṇaṁ ghāta, hetusu.
anya-e0809n4:1402_0: Hatthidāne mado gabbe, ghaṭā ghaṭana rāsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1407_0: Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givā galepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1410_0: Bhaṅgo bhede paṭe bhaṅgaṁ, chattaṁ tu chavakepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1412_0: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madano dume;
anya-e0809n4:1420_0: Khette vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī) vappo taṭepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1425_0: Saṅghāto yugagehaṅge, khāro ūse ca bhasmani.
